#summary Instructions on adding or updating files

`MatlabTools` is automatically downloaded by the [http://pmtk3.googlecode.com PMTK3] package. For this to work, the matlabTools.zip file must be kept up to date. Please follow these steps when making changes. 

  # Make sure all of the changes have been checked into the svn repository. 
  # With `MatlabTools` on your matlab path, run {{{refreshMatlabToolsZip}}}.
  # Check the 'refreshed' zip file into svn.
  # Update the online documentation by running the reports in [http://matlabtools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/meta/localReports/ meta/localReports]
